text: The Optare StarRider was a step-entrance midibus and minicoach made by Optare from 1987StarRider's touchdown Commercial Motor 6 August 1987 to 1994. It was built on the Mercedes-Benz 811D chassis. In 1995, it was replaced by the Optare MetroRider ==References== ==Other websites== StarRider Category:Midibuses
title: Optare StarRider
